Song.title: I Will Glory In My Redeemer
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve and Vikki Cook © 2001 Sovereign Grace Worship
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B000YZQ7SA","title":"I Will Glory in My Redeemer","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/516fS-1BfuL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C G | Am F | C G | Am]
Verse 1: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer Whose [C/E]priceless [F]blood has [C/E]ransomed [G]me Mine [C]was the [F]sin that [G]drove the [Am]bit[G]ter [F]nails And [C/E]hung Him on that [G]judgment [C]tree [Dm7] [C/E]I will [F]glory in [G]my Re[C]deemer Who [G/B]crushed the [Am]power of [F]sin and [Gsus G]death My [C/E]only [F]Savior be[G]fore the [C]holy [D]Judge The [Am]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[Fmaj7]ness [G] The [Am]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[C (intro)]ness.
Verse 2: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer My [C/E]life He [F]bought, my [C/E]love He [G]owns I [C]have no [F]longings [G]for a[Am]no[G]-[F]ther I’m [C/E]satisfied in [G]Him a[C]lone. [Dm7] [C/E]I will [F]glory in [G]my Re[C]deemer His [G/B]faithful[Am]ness my [F]standing [Gsus G]place Though [C/E]foes are [F]mighty and [G]rush u[C]pon [D]me My [Am]feet are firm, held [G]by His [Fmaj7]grace [G] My [Am]feet are firm, held [G]by His [C (intro)]grace.
{new_page} Verse 3: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer Who [C/E]carries [F]me on [C/E]eagle’s [G]wings He [C]crowns my [F]life with [G]loving[Am]kind[G]-[F]ness His [C/E]triumph song I’ll [G]ever [C]sing [(modulate up)] {key:D} [D/F#]I will [G]glory in [Asus4]my Re[D]deemer Who [D/C#]waits for [Bm]me at [Gmaj7]gates of [A]gold And [D/F#]when He [G]calls me it [Asus4]will be [D]para[E]dise His [Bm]face forever [A]to be[Gmaj7]hold [A] His [Bm]face forever [A]to be[Gmaj7]hold [A] His [Bm]face forever [A]to be[||: D A | Bm G :|| D ]hold
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i will glory in my redeemer whose priceless blood has ransomed me mine was the sin that drove the bitter nails and hung him on that judgment tree i will glory in my redeemer who crushed the power of sin and death my only savior before the holy judge the lamb who is my righteousness the lamb who is my righteousness verse 2 i will glory in my redeemer my life he bought my love he owns i have no longings for another im satisfied in him alone i will glory in my redeemer his faithfulness my standing place though foes are mighty and rush upon me my feet are firm held by his grace my feet are firm held by his grace verse 3 i will glory in my redeemer who carries me on eagles wings he crowns my life with lovingkindness his triumph song ill ever sing i will glory in my redeemer who waits for me at gates of gold and when he calls me it will be paradise his face forever to behold his face forever to behold his face forever to behold

Arrangement.description: Arrangement from Songs For The Cross-Centered Life
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C G | Am7 F2 | C G | Am]
Verse 1: I will [C]glory in [G]my Red[Am7]eemer Whose priceless [F2]blood has ransomed [G]me Mine [C]was the [F2]sin that [G]drove the [Am]bitter [F]nails And [C/E]hung Him [F2]on that [G]judgment [C]tree I will [F2]glory in my Red[C]eemer Who crushed the [Am7]power of [F2]sin and [Gsus]death My [C]only [F]Savior be[G]fore [ 4/4]the [C]holy [D]Judge [3/4]The [Am7]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[Fmaj9]ness [G] The [Am]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[C G | Am F | C G | F]ness.
Verse 2: I will [C]glory in [G]my Red[Am7]eemer My life He [F2]bought, my love He [G]owns I [C]have no [F2]longings [G]for [Am]ano-[F]ther I’m [C/E]satis[F2]fied in [G]Him al[C]one. I will [F2]glory in my Re[C]deemer His faithful[Am7]ness my [F2]standing [Gsus]place Though [C]foes are [F]mighty and [G]rush[4/4] up[C]on [D]me [3/4]My [Am7]feet are firm, held [G]by His [Fmaj9]grace [G] My [Am7]feet are firm, held [G]by His [||: C G | Am F | C G | F :||]grace.
{new_page} Verse 3: I will [C]glory in [G]my Red[Am7]eemer Who [C/E]carries [F]me on [C/E]eagle’s [G]wings He [C/E]crowns my [F]life with [G]loving[Am]kind[G]-[F]ness His [C/E]triumph [C/F]song I’ll [G]ever [C]sing [(modulate up)] {key:D} I will [G]glory in [Asus]my Red[D]eemer Who [D/C#]waits for [Bm]me at [Gmaj7]gates of [A]gold And [D/F#]when He [G]calls me it [Asus]will [7/4]be [D]para[E]dise [3/4]His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[Gmaj7]old [A] His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[D A | Bm G | Dmaj7 D/A | G | D]old
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i will glory in my redeemer whose priceless blood has ransomed me mine was the sin that drove the bitter nails and hung him on that judgment tree i will glory in my redeemer who crushed the power of sin and death my only savior before the holy judge the lamb who is my righteousness the lamb who is my righteousness verse 2 i will glory in my redeemer my life he bought my love he owns i have no longings for another im satisfied in him alone i will glory in my redeemer his faithfulness my standing place though foes are mighty and rush upon me my feet are firm held by his grace my feet are firm held by his grace verse 3 i will glory in my redeemer who carries me on eagles wings he crowns my life with lovingkindness his triumph song ill ever sing i will glory in my redeemer who waits for me at gates of gold and when he calls me it will be paradise his face forever to behold his face forever to behold

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D Asus | Bm7 G2 | D Asus | G2 (repeat)]
Verse 1: I will [D]glory in [A]my Red[Bm]eemer Whose priceless [G]blood has [D/F#]ransomed [A]me Mine [D]was the [G]sin that [A]drove the [Bm]bitter [G]nails And [D]hung Him on that [A]judgment [D]tree I will [G]glory in [A]my Red[D]eemer Who [A/C#]crushed the [Bm]power of [G]sin and [A]death My [D]only [G]Savior be[A]fore t[4/4]he [D]holy [E]Judge [3/4]The [Bm]Lamb Who is my [A]righteous[G]ness [A] The [Bm]Lamb Who is my [A]righteous[| D A | Bm G | D A | G]ness.
Verse 2: I will [D]glory in [A]my Red[Bm]eemer My [D]life He [G]bought, my [D/F#]love He [A]owns I [D]have no [G]longings [A]for a[Bm]no[G]ther I’m [D]satisfied in [A]Him al[D]one. I will [G]glory in [A]my Re[D]deemer His [A/C#]faithful[Bm]ness my [G]standing [A]place Though [D]foes are [G]mighty and [A]rus[4/4]h u[D]pon [E]me [3/4]My [Bm]feet are firm, held [A]by His [G]grace [A] My [Bm]feet are firm, held [A]by His [(to bridge)]grace.
{new_page} {key:C} Bridge: [C2 G | Am7 F | C G | F2]
[C/G G | F2/A F | C/G G | F2]
{key:D} Verse 3: [C/E]I will [D]glory in [A]my Red[Bm]eemer Who carries [G]me on [D/F#]eagle’s [A]wings He [D]crowns my [G]life with [A]loving[Bm]kind[A]-[G]ness His [D/F#]triumph [D/G]song I’ll [A]ever [D]sing I will [G]glory in [A]my Re[D]deemer Who [D/C#]waits for [Bm]me at [G]gates of [A]gold And [D]when He [G]calls me it [A]will be [D]para[E]dise His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[G]old His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[C2]old I will [G]glory in [A]my Re[D]deemer Who [D/C#]waits for [Bm]me at [G]gates of [A]gold And [D]when He [G]calls me it [A]will be [D]para[E]dise His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[G]old [A] His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[G]old [A] His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[G]old [A] His [Bm]face forever [A]to beh[||: D A | Bm G | D A | G :|| D]old
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i will glory in my redeemer whose priceless blood has ransomed me mine was the sin that drove the bitter nails and hung him on that judgment tree i will glory in my redeemer who crushed the power of sin and death my only savior before the holy judge the lamb who is my righteousness the lamb who is my righteousness verse 2 i will glory in my redeemer my life he bought my love he owns i have no longings for another im satisfied in him alone i will glory in my redeemer his faithfulness my standing place though foes are mighty and rush upon me my feet are firm held by his grace my feet are firm held by his grace bridge verse 3 i will glory in my redeemer who carries me on eagles wings he crowns my life with lovingkindness his triumph song ill ever sing i will glory in my redeemer who waits for me at gates of gold and when he calls me it will be paradise his face forever to behold his face forever to behold i will glory in my redeemer who waits for me at gates of gold and when he calls me it will be paradise his face forever to behold his face forever to behold his face forever to behold his face forever to behold
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C G | Am F | C G | Am]
Verse 1: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer Whose [C/E]priceless [F]blood has [C/E]ransomed [G]me Mine [C]was the [F]sin that [G]drove the [Am]bit[G]ter [F]nails And [C/E]hung Him on that [G]judgment [C]tree [Dm7] [C/E]I will [F]glory in [G]my Re[C]deemer Who [G/B]crushed the [Am]power of [F]sin and [Gsus G]death My [C/E]only [F]Savior be[G]fore the [C]holy [D]Judge The [Am]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[Fmaj7]ness [G] The [Am]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[C (intro)]ness.
Verse 2: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer My [C/E]life He [F]bought, my [C/E]love He [G]owns I [C]have no [F]longings [G]for a[Am]no[G]-[F]ther I’m [C/E]satisfied in [G]Him a[C]lone. [Dm7] [C/E]I will [F]glory in [G]my Re[C]deemer His [G/B]faithful[Am]ness my [F]standing [Gsus G]place Though [C/E]foes are [F]mighty and [G]rush u[C]pon [D]me My [Am]feet are firm, held [G]by His [Fmaj7]grace [G] My [Am]feet are firm, held [G]by His [C (intro)]grace.
{new_page} Verse 3: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer Who [C/E]carries [F]me on [C/E]eagle’s [G]wings He [C]crowns my [F]life with [G]loving[Am]kind[G]-[F]ness His [C/E]triumph song I’ll [G]ever [C]sing [Dm7] [C/E]I will [F]glory in [G]my Re[C]deemer Who [G/B]waits for [Am]me at [F]gates of [Gsus G]gold And [C/E]when He [F]calls me it [G]will be [C]para[D]dise His [Am]face forever [G]to be[Fmaj7]hold [G] His [Am]face forever [G]to be[||: C G | Am F :|| C ]hold
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i will glory in my redeemer whose priceless blood has ransomed me mine was the sin that drove the bitter nails and hung him on that judgment tree i will glory in my redeemer who crushed the power of sin and death my only savior before the holy judge the lamb who is my righteousness the lamb who is my righteousness verse 2 i will glory in my redeemer my life he bought my love he owns i have no longings for another im satisfied in him alone i will glory in my redeemer his faithfulness my standing place though foes are mighty and rush upon me my feet are firm held by his grace my feet are firm held by his grace verse 3 i will glory in my redeemer who carries me on eagles wings he crowns my life with lovingkindness his triumph song ill ever sing i will glory in my redeemer who waits for me at gates of gold and when he calls me it will be paradise his face forever to behold his face forever to behold

Arrangement.description: key change to D last verse
Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C G | Am F | C G | Am]
Verse 1: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer Whose [C/E]priceless [F]blood has [C/E]ransomed [G]me Mine [C]was the [F]sin that [G]drove the [Am]bit[G]ter [F]nails And [C/E]hung Him on that [G]judgment [C]tree [Dm7] [C/E]I will [F]glory in [G]my Re[C]deemer Who [G/B]crushed the [Am]power of [F]sin and [Gsus G]death My [C/E]only [F]Savior be[G]fore the [C]holy [D]Judge The [Am]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[Fmaj7]ness [G] The [Am]Lamb Who is my [G]righteous[C (intro)]ness.
Verse 2: [F]I will [C]glory in [G]my Re[Am]deemer My [C/E]life He [F]bought, my [C/E]love He [G]owns I [C]have no [F]longings [G]for a[Am]no[G]-[F]ther I’m [C/E]satisfied in [G]Him a[C]lone. [Dm7] [C/E]I will [F]glory in [G]my Re[C]deemer His [G/B]faithful[Am]ness my [F]standing [Gsus G]place Though [C/E]foes are [F]mighty and [G]rush u[C]pon [D]me My [Am]feet are firm, held [G]by His [Fmaj7]grace [G] My [Am]feet are firm, held [G]by His [C (intro)]grace.
{new_page} {key:D} Verse 3: [G]I will [D]glory in [A]my Re[Bm]deemer Who [D/F#]carries [G]me on [D/F#]eagle’s [A]wings He [D]crowns my [G]life with [A]loving[Bm]kind[A]-[G]ness His [D/F#]triumph song I’ll [A]ever [D]sing [Em7] [D/F#]I will [G]glory in [A]my Re[D]deemer Who [A/C#]waits for [Bm]me at [G]gates of [Asus A]gold And [D/F#]when He [G]calls me it [A]will be [D]para[E]dise His [Bm]face forever [A]to be[Gmaj7]hold [A] His [Bm]face forever [A]to be[||: D A | Bm G :|| D ]hold
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i will glory in my redeemer whose priceless blood has ransomed me mine was the sin that drove the bitter nails and hung him on that judgment tree i will glory in my redeemer who crushed the power of sin and death my only savior before the holy judge the lamb who is my righteousness the lamb who is my righteousness verse 2 i will glory in my redeemer my life he bought my love he owns i have no longings for another im satisfied in him alone i will glory in my redeemer his faithfulness my standing place though foes are mighty and rush upon me my feet are firm held by his grace my feet are firm held by his grace verse 3 i will glory in my redeemer who carries me on eagles wings he crowns my life with lovingkindness his triumph song ill ever sing i will glory in my redeemer who waits for me at gates of gold and when he calls me it will be paradise his face forever to behold his face forever to behold
